eu.monnetproject.bliss

Class WordMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.AbstractObject2IntFunction<K>
      • it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.AbstractObject2IntMap<K>
        • it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2IntOpenHashMap<String>
          • eu.monnetproject.bliss.WordMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.Function<String,Integer>, it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.Hash, it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2IntFunction<String>, it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2IntMap<String>, Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,Integer>

    public class WordMap
extends it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2IntOpenHashMap<String>
    An index of words used to integerize language data. Note, if you add only using offer() the largest value in the map will be exactly the size() of the map.
    Author:
    John McCrae
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
